src:
Kylian Mbappe Diyakini Suatu Hari Nanti Bakal Gabung Real Madrid
03 Nov 2019, 21:21 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bintang PSG, Kylian Mbappe bakal menjadi pemain Real Madrid suatu hari nanti. Keyakinan itu dilontarkan oleh presiden AS Monaco, Vadim Vasilyev.
Setelah moncer bersama Monaco pada musim 2016-17, Mbappe pun langsung menjadi incaran sejumlah klub top Eropa, termasuk Real Madrid.
Namun kala itu Mbappe memilih pindah ke PSG dengan status pinjaman sebelum setahun kemudian dipermanenkan dengan biaya 180 juta euro termasuk bonus.
text:
Kylian Mbappe is believed to one day join Real Madrid
Nov 03 2019, 21:21 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSG star Kylian Mbappe will become a Real Madrid player one day. That conviction was leveled by US Monaco president, Vadim Vasilyev.
After playing with Monaco in the 2016-17 season, Mbappe immediately became the target of a number of top European clubs, including Real Madrid.
But at that time Mbappe chose to move to PSG on loan before a year later was permanent at a cost of 180 million euros, including bonuses.
